short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab page with a personal dashboard featuring main-focus, weather, and inspiration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily Assistant is a new tab extension where you set a main focus for your day and also get weather updates with beautiful backgrounds.
